title: STEM-Integrated PBL Program for Strengthening Social Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-Level STEM Foundational Knowledge and Basic Understanding of Social Phenomena
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment using digital devices, offering simulation tasks reflecting real-world social issues

learning_goals: Students can design projects that integrate STEM elements (science, technology, engineering, mathematics) to solve social issues
Learners can systematically perform problem analysis → solution development → outcome evaluation phases through a PBL (Project-Based Learning) process
Participants can enhance creative problem-solving skills through team-based collaboration in a VR simulation environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
